body_html: I also faced this issue when using tensorflow-gpu 1.4.0. When I switched to tensorflow cpu version 1.9.0 and ran the same code, this issue disappeared. So I updated my tensorflow-gpu version to 1.9.0 as well as CUDA and cuDNN to 9.0 and the issue is solved.
body_text: I also faced this issue when using tensorflow-gpu 1.4.0. When I switched to tensorflow cpu version 1.9.0 and ran the same code, this issue disappeared. So I updated my tensorflow-gpu version to 1.9.0 as well as CUDA and cuDNN to 9.0 and the issue is solved.
body: I also faced this issue when using tensorflow-gpu 1.4.0. When I switched to tensorflow cpu version 1.9.0 and ran the same code, this issue disappeared. So I updated my tensorflow-gpu version to 1.9.0 as well as CUDA and cuDNN to 9.0 and the issue is solved.
